Command.Name: login
Command.Description: Log in to Contentful. Run this first.

Option.Description: Your Contentful Content Delivery API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
The Contentful environment identifier. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/concepts/multiple-environments/[/]
Specifies whether warning prompts should be bypassed
Outputs logs to the console instead of the standard messages.
Your Contentful management API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
Do not display the startup banner or the copyright message.
The Azure OpenAI deployment name.
The Azure OpenAI endpoint.
The Azure OpenAI Api key.
Your Contentful Content Preview API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
The Contentful space identifier. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/help/spaces-and-organizations/[/]
Sets the output verbosity level. Allowed values are (q)uiet, (m)inimal, (n)ormal, (de)tailed and (di)agnostic.

Command.Name: content
Command.Description: Manage content entries in bulk.

Command.Name: download
Command.Description: Download Contentful entries to a local csv/tsv/yaml/json/excel file.

Option.Description: The Contentful content type id.
Your Contentful Content Delivery API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
The Contentful environment identifier. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/concepts/multiple-environments/[/]
Specifies whether warning prompts should be bypassed
The output format for the download operation (Excel/Csv/Tsv/Json/Yaml)
The locale code (eg. 'en') to apply the command to. Default is all.
Outputs logs to the console instead of the standard messages.
Your Contentful management API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
Do not display the startup banner or the copyright message.
The output path and filename for the download operation
Your Contentful Content Preview API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
The Contentful space identifier. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/help/spaces-and-organizations/[/]
Sets the output verbosity level. Allowed values are (q)uiet, (m)inimal, (n)ormal, (de)tailed and (di)agnostic.

Command.Name: upload
Command.Description: Upload and sync Contentful entries from a local csv/tsv/yaml/json/excel file.

Option.Description: Apply and publish all the calculated changes. The default behaviour is to only list the detected changes.
The Contentful content type id.
Your Contentful Content Delivery API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
The Contentful environment identifier. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/concepts/multiple-environments/[/]
Specifies whether warning prompts should be bypassed
The format of the file specified in '--path' (Excel/Csv/Tsv/Json/Yaml)
The locale code (eg. 'en') to apply the command to. Default is all.
Outputs logs to the console instead of the standard messages.
Your Contentful management API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
The optional name of the field to match in addition to the entry id.
Do not display the startup banner or the copyright message.
The local path to the file containg the data to sync
Your Contentful Content Preview API token. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/authentication/[/]
The Contentful space identifier. See [italic LightSkyBlue3]https://www.contentful.com/help/spaces-and-organizations/[/]
Sets the output verbosity level. Allowed values are (q)uiet, (m)inimal, (n)ormal, (de)tailed and (di)agnostic.
